title: Venezuela: Citi Opens New Branch in Puerto La Cruz
summary: Puerto la Cruz, Venezuela - Citibank opened a new branch in the city of Puerto La Cruz, during the celebration of Citi's 95 years of continuous service in Venezuela and 200th anniversary globally. The new branch, located at Avenida Principal de las Lecherías on the ground floor, will offer the same high-quality financial services in a much more convenient location.
tag-1: Venezuela: Citi Opens New Branch in Puerto La Cruz
tag-3: Puerto la Cruz, Venezuela – Citibank opened a new branch in the city of Puerto La Cruz, during the celebration of Citi's 95 years of continuous service in Venezuela and 200th anniversary globally. The new branch, located at Avenida Principal de las Lecherías on the ground floor, will offer the same high-quality financial services in a much more convenient location.
tag-4: Located in the city center, an easier area for our eastern-region clients to access, the new branch offers Citibank clients the best comfort and quality services for their financial transactions.
tag-5: The president of Citibank Venezuela, Nelson Acosta, hosted the opening event together with other Citi executives and welcomed a local group of clients. "Venezuela is an important market for Citi," emphasized Acosta. "Citibank has continuously been present in Venezuela since 1917. During this time, we have not only contributed to the economic and financial development of the country, but we have also built a reputation of prestige and reliability. For Citibank, customers are the priority and our reason for being. That is why every day we assess our products and services, and look for opportunities to improve our product offerings in the market."
tag-6: Citigroup is a financial services company with a 200-year history, with presence in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions around the world. This initiative reaffirms the commitment of Citi to continue to support the future and solidity of the Venezuelan economy.
tag-7: The services in this new branch will include, among others: Blue and Citigold accounts customer service available from 8:30 a.m. - 3:30 p.m., active account inquiries, Commission for the Administration of Currency Exchange (CADIVI) file services, returned checks, debit cards, checks and cash withdrawals, official checks, cash deposits, cash advances and Citibanking Center.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
